languages.text: "Придется. Не всех моих бывших товарищей, видно, переловили". {n}Старик говорит механически, будто по инерции.{/n}
"There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Придется. Не всех моих бывших товарищей, видно, переловили". {n}Старик говорит механически, будто по инерции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former fellows are still on the loose out there." {n}The old man's speech has a mechanical, inertial-motion quality to it.{/n}
"There sure will be. It looks like some of my former fellows are still on the loose out there." {n}The old man's speech has a mechanical, inertial-motion quality to it.{/n}
"There sure will be. It looks like some of my former fellows are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

"There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}
"There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

languages.text: "Mit Sicherheit. Einige meiner ehemaligen Kameraden sind wohl noch auf freiem Fuß." {n}Die Stimme des alten Mannes klingt lethargisch, fast roboterhaft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mit Sicherheit. Einige meiner ehemaligen Gefährten sind wohl noch auf freiem Fuß. {n}Die Stimme des alten Mannes klingt lethargisch, fast roboterhaft.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est une certitude. On dirait que certains de mes anciens compagnons courent toujours, » {n}dit le vieil homme d'une voix léthargique et presque robotique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est une certitude. On dirait que certains de mes anciens compagnons courent toujours, » {n}dit le vieil homme d'une voix léthargique et presque robotique.{/n}

languages.text: “肯定会有，看起来我一部分曾经的同伴还在逍遥法外。”{n}老人无精打采地开了口，声音就像是机器发出来的一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “肯定会有，看起来我一部分前同事还在逍遥法外。”{n}老人无精打采的声音就像是机器发出来的一样。{/n}

languages.text: 「確かにそうでしょう。以前の同志の何人かがまだ逃げ回っているようです」{n}老人の声は不活発で、ほとんどロボットのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「確かにそうでしょう。以前の仲間の何人かがまだ逃げ回っているようです」{n}老人の声は不活発で、ほとんどロボットのようだった。{/n}

languages.text: «Seguro que los habrá. Parece que algunos de mis antiguos compañeros siguen sueltos». {n}La voz del anciano suena apática y casi robótica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Seguro que los habrá. Parece que algunos de mis antiguos compañeros siguen sueltos». {n}La voz del anciano suena apática y casi robótica.{/n}

languages.text: "Orası kesin. Eski yoldaşlarımdan bazıları hâlâ serbest anlaşılan." {n}Yaşlı adamın sesi, uyuşuk ve robotmuş gibi monoton çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There sure will be. It looks like some of my former comrades are still on the loose." {n}The old man's voice sounds lethargic and almost robotic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Pek tabii. Eski yoldaşlarımın birkaçı henüz yakalanmamış anlaşılan." {n}Yaşlı adamın sesi, uyuşuk ve robotmuş gibi monoton çıkıyor.{/n}
